issue_title: [Bug] Todo.rename() method exists in model but no CLI command exposes it to users
fix_summary: Add 'rename' CLI subcommand to expose Todo.rename() method to users

cli_changes: Added TodoApp.rename() method following same pattern as mark_done/mark_undone
Added 'rename' subparser in build_parser() with id and text arguments
Added handler in run_command() for the rename command

approach: Minimal fix following existing patterns in codebase. Added rename command handler similar to done/undone/rm commands.
risks: Low risk - follows existing patterns, all tests pass, no breaking changes.
